name: camelizer_get_price_chart
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool price_tracking_tools.
Tool description: This API currently helps to query for prices of products from Amazon. We will support more other sites/brands soon. Stay tune!
API description: Fetches a price history chart of a specified product from Amazon using the Camelizer API.

asin.description: The ASIN (Amazon Standard Identification Number) of a product from Amazon. Example: 'B08QB93S6R'.

lang.description: The language for the chart. One of the following: 'en', 'fr', 'de', 'it', 'es'. Default is 'en'.

tp.description: The time period for the price history. One of the following: '1m', '3m', '6m', '1y', 'all'. Default is '3m'.

w.description: The width of the chart in pixels. Default is 720.

h.description: The height of the chart in pixels. Default is 480.

country.description: The country-specific Amazon site. One of the following: 'au', 'ca', 'fr', 'de', 'it', 'es', 'uk', 'us'. Default is 'us'.
